option.name: mode
option._long: Specifies whether blurring should be automatic or manual. Possible values are `normal` and `toggle`. `normal` means automatic and `toggle` manual.

option.name: box_offset
option._long: Sets the offset value for the box method.

option.name: box_degrade
option._long: Sets the degrade value for the box method.

option.name: box_iterations
option._long: Sets the iterations for the box method.

option.name: gaussian_offset
option._long: Sets the offset value for the gaussian method.

option.name: gaussian_degrade
option._long: Sets the degrade value for the gaussian method.

option.name: gaussian_iterations
option._long: Sets the iterations for the gaussian method.

option.name: kawase_offset
option._long: Sets the offset value for the kawase method.

option.name: kawase_degrade
option._long: Sets the degrade value for the kawase method.

option.name: kawase_iterations
option._long: Sets the iterations for the kawase method.

option.name: bokeh_offset
option._long: Sets the offset value for the bokeh method.

option.name: bokeh_degrade
option._long: Sets the degrade value for the bokeh method.

option.name: bokeh_iterations
option._long: Sets the iterations for the bokeh method.

option.name: toggle
option._long: Sets the shortcut to toggle blurring for a specific window.
